pages.text: As mentioned previously, the sand from Tal'Dain reacts to physical investiture, which means that it can be measured. Common technology on this planet seems to use a substance called 'redstone' in order to power their fabrials. A device like the 'Comparator' Can measure the investiture in the sand jar, and release a redstone signal.
You can place the sand jar item on the ground as a block by crouching (holding $(k:key.sneak)$()) while placing, you can also craft the block back into a jar when picked up.
